Title: Vintage 49mm POCKET WATCH Unitas MONROE 17J Swiss RUNNING clean 1950s 24h dial
Description: Vintage Pocket Watch Unbranded Keywind watch. ________________________________________________________ MOVEMENT: Probably Unitas, marked "426". Equivalent to a 19 Swiss lignes or 16 size (USA). 17 jewels, adjusted, incabloc, Swiss made. Stem wind, stem set, subsecond dial. Probably dates from the 1950s. Probably serviced recently, movement seems very clean. Runs very good at time of listing (excellent readings on time machine on 3 positions, see last picture), and keeps good time after 24 straight hours. ________________________________________________________ CASE: Open face case. Screw down bezel & back cover; screw/unscrew very well. "Victory", rolled gold plate. Lightly buffed recently. Still some tiny dents & surface scratches on back. Measures about 49.1mm wide, by 55.5mm tall (without swing ring); 14.2 mm thick. (Roughly 1.9" wide; 2.2" tall; 0.56" thick). ________________________________________________________ CRYSTAL: Acrylic, freshly buffed, very nice and clear, microscopic scratches. ________________________________________________________ DIAL: Very clean, tiny hairlines in the 4-5 o'clock area. Marked "MONROE 17 jewels Swiss Made". 12 hour Arabic numerals, smalelr 24 hour military/railroad style). Subsecond dial. Measures 42.1 mm diameter. All three black hands are correct, and in very good condition. ________________________________________________________ TOTAL WEIGHT OF WATCH: 83 grams. ________________________________________________________ Please scroll down to look at all my pictures below.
